definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Houyi, mythological Chinese archer whose wife was Chang'e
Houli township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
empress's throne/(fig.) first place in a feminine competition
Houli township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: Kiss the sky --- Zhang said after.
Lippi overlooks last summer's Confederations Cup, in which his team lost to Egypt and Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 裏皮回想去在聯合會杯上他的隊伍輸給埃及和巴西后。

sentences.english: Tearing git open, she found four Paris phone numbers.
sentences.chinese: 打開信封后，她發現了四個巴黎市內的電話號碼。

sentences.english: What five-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?
sentences.chinese: 哪個五個字母的單詞加上兩個字母后變短了？

sentences.english: You can soar only by pushing back against something you don't want.
sentences.chinese: 只有在推走那些你不想要的東西后，你才能高飛。

sentences.english: After his next projects, he said he planned to take a break.
sentences.chinese: 他說拍完下幾部電影后計劃休息一段時間。

sentences.english: After a long day the range you relax by watching "Red Dawn".
sentences.chinese: 行軍一整天后，你看《赤色黎明》來放鬆。

sentences.english: The player should learn to use a cross over step to recover from wide balls.
sentences.chinese: 選手應學習在回擊大外角球來球后，以交叉跨步回防。

sentences.english: Postischemic recovery of coronary flow in group B was significantly reduced compared with group A.
sentences.chinese: 組缺血后冠狀動脈流量的恢復顯著低於A組。

sentences.english: At Blackburn I used to just get the ball and run at people, head down.
sentences.chinese: 在布萊克本我習慣於得球后朝人衝過去，然後被放倒。

sentences.english: Uncle, Empress Mother, I wish you both everlasting happiness.
His attendants pretended to pick up the long train at the back of his cloak.
sentences.chinese: 侍從們假裝拾起皇帝披風后那長長的後裾。

sentences.english: A soldier grabs some shut-eye after catching a movie in a cinema on the base.
sentences.chinese: 一名士兵在基地影院看電影后躺下休息。

sentences.english: My muscles are sore from playing baseball.
sentences.chinese: 打完棒球后，我的肌肉一直痠痛。

sentences.english: Besides, the variation of evaporation from soil as related to leaf area index has also been calculated and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 並分析了返青后土壤蒸發隨葉面積指數變化的規律。

sentences.english: After_the songs, i ofter play computer games_my sister.
sentences.chinese: 唱完歌后，我經常和妹妹玩電腦遊戲。

definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
